events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The recruitment team reviewed the application and categorized it under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's relevant software engineering background.
Assigned a dedicated recruiter to manage the candidate's recruitment process ensuring timely communication and follow up.
Conducted a preliminary screening call to assess the candidate's skills and motivation for the software engineer role with promising feedback received.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward to the next stage of technical interviews.
Scheduled a technical interview with the engineering team to evaluate the candidateâ€™s problem-solving skills and coding proficiency in depth.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and effective use of devops tools.
HR interview was set up to discuss company culture, candidate expectations, and further administrative questions.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate aligning with company values and expressing strong interest in the role.
Extended a formal job offer to the candidate including details on compensation, benefits, and onboarding plans.
